uk.ac.ebi.pride.tools.apl_parser

Class AplFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ebi.pride.tools.apl_parser.AplFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    uk.ac.ebi.pride.tools.jmzreader.JMzReader

    public class AplFile
extends Object
implements uk.ac.ebi.pride.tools.jmzreader.JMzReader
    This class implement the JmzReader Interface to provide the information of apl spectra. Created by neuhause on 11/02/14.

      • AplFile

        public AplFile(File file,
       List<uk.ac.ebi.pride.tools.jmzreader.model.IndexElement> index)
        throws uk.ac.ebi.pride.tools.jmzreader.JMzReaderException
        Creates the mgf file object from an existing mgf file with a pre-parsed index of ms2 spectra. The index must hold the offsets of all "BEGIN IONS" lines in the order they appear in the file.
        Parameters:
        file - The mgf file
        index - An ArrayList holding the
        Throws:
        uk.ac.ebi.pride.tools.jmzreader.JMzReaderException

        public static uk.ac.ebi.pride.tools.jmzreader.model.Spectrum getIndexedSpectrum(File sourcefile,
                                                                uk.ac.ebi.pride.tools.jmzreader.model.IndexElement indexElement)
                                                                         throws uk.ac.ebi.pride.tools.jmzreader.JMzReaderException
        Loads a (MS2) spectrum from an APL file who's position in the file is already known.
        Parameters:
        sourcefile - The APL file to load the spectrum from.
        indexElement - IndexElement specifying the position of the MS2 spectrum in the MGF file.
        Returns:
        The unmarshalled spectrum object.
        Throws:
        uk.ac.ebi.pride.tools.jmzreader.JMzReaderException

        public void setPeakLists(List<PeakList> peakLists)

      • getIndex

        public List<uk.ac.ebi.pride.tools.jmzreader.model.IndexElement> getIndex()
        Returns the index of ms2 queries in the mgf file. This ArrayList contains the offsets of all "BEGIN IONS" lines until the end of the "END IONS" lines in the file in the order they are present.
        Returns:
        An array of "BEGIN IONS" lines offsets.
